agents.name: Job Listing
agents.description: Creates job listing workspace with folder structure. Collects job details, creates Drive folders, and sets up tracking system.

agents.name: Job Listing_briefing
agents.description: Creates job listing workspace with folder structure. Collects job details, creates Drive folders, and sets up tracking system.

agents.name: HireIT
agents.description: Intelligent recruitment orchestrator that manages the entire hiring workflow. Delegates tasks to specialized agents for job listing, screening, interviews, and tracking.

agents.name: Interviewer
agents.description: Specialized interviewing agent for HireIT AI. Consumes interview transcripts, scores candidates, and generates summaries.

comment: Add more agents here as you deploy them. Get agent IDs from watsonx Orchestrate UI > Agents > Channels > Embedded agent
